title: SET_PAUSE_MENU_PED_LIGHTING
content:
0x3CA6050692BC61B00x127310EB// SetPauseMenuPedLighting
void SET_PAUSE_MENU_PED_LIGHTING(BOOL state);Parameters:state: True enables the light, false disables the light.Toggles the light state for the pause menu ped in frontend menus.This is used by R* in combination with SET_PAUSE_MENU_PED_SLEEP_STATE to toggle the "offline" or "online" state in the "friends" tab of the pause menu in GTA Online.Example:
On: 
Off:
